title: I was just invited to possibly ask Trump a question at NBC’s Town Hall tomorrow night. What should I ask him?
selftext:
So I just received my invite to this event and I’m obviously extremely excited as someone that considers myself pretty engaged in politics. I’ve been told that I might be picked to ask President Trump a live question at the event, but I’m struggling to come up with what I want to ask. Let me be clear—I am not a fan of Trump. 

I want to ask a question that puts him on the spot but that also makes it both hard for him to dodge and that cannot easily be dismissed by conservatives. I also think that there’s been plenty of COVID related questions. I figured this community could help me out with picking a couple possible questions.

With that said, if you could ask Trump one question, what would it be?

Edit: I wrote “love” instead of “live” by accident originally
